titleStmt.title: Rules, orders, and directions by the lord lieutenant and council
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1672-1677 : Essex)
Essex, Arthur Capel, Earl of, 1631-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke ... and are to be sold by Joseph Wilde ...,

notesStmt.note: "... for the better regulating the several cities, walled towns, and corporations of Cork, Waterford, Kingsale ..."--Caption, p. [3].
"Given at the Council-chamber in Dublin, the three and twentieth day of September, 1672."-- p. 17.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
